diff_act: 3.replace any departed user with a new Computer Opponent

regen.absent_element: replacement of departed user with a new CO when the game ends due to four rounds completion
regen.new_specification: When the game concludes after four rounds, the system shall replace any departed user with a new Computer Opponent before updating all clients and offering options to quit or restart.

regen.absent_element: replacement of a departed user with a new Computer Opponent when the game is still ongoing
regen.new_specification: The system shall replace any departed user with a new Computer Opponent immediately after their departure, ensuring the continuity of the game.

regen.absent_element: handling of user departure during the game and replacement with a Computer Opponent
regen.new_specification: When a user departs early, the system shall replace them with a new Computer Opponent and notify all connected clients of the change.

label: If a user leaves the game prematurely, a new CO is created to fill their place.
absence: creation of a new CO to fill the place of a user leaving the game prematurely
